labels: openbsd firewall networking pf bridge wan load balancing proxy
name: openbsd-firewall
short_description: This project aims to highlight the pf(4) firewall capability of OpenBSD. It is well integrated with the kernel and does sophisticated networking functions like IP blocking, traffic load balancing, NAT and port forwarding in addition to several others
summary: A pf based firewall ruleset to control traffic
